projectContent.text: This is a collection of random fragments of an object that pretends to be neutral, quiet, rigid, but that during its treatment shapes a piece of world, of path, of instance. It is composed by three series of pictures: 1. *Arqueologías* – Archaeologies (42 pictures), 2. *Piedra a piedra* – Stone by Stone (Installation) and 3. *Piedras líquidas* – Liquid stones (5 intervened pictures and a letter).

‘A search for the liquid stones’ is a three-phase work: the register, the destruction and the artificial edification; it sets a dialectic of time and territory, the construct of a memory and an impression that make an archive; an archive that wonders about the power of who creates it (…), an archive that wonders who and what makes memory.
